name: Golden Boot Clash
description:
A perfect time killer with super-intuitive controls for all soccer fans!

*Master the art of Free-kicks!*
Shoot over different walls to score goals and hit precise targets to rack up points.

Notes:
- The game uses Wi-Fi or mobile data (network fees may apply). A network connection is required to play the game

Golden Boot Clash is the fresh, social competitive twist to the classic game where you can win Real World Rewards and Cash prizes (where available)! Swipe Fast and use skill to take the soccer world by storm. Join millions of players and play in amazing and exotic tournaments.

Historically, soccer free kicks were a very competitive play. If you were skilful enough, you'd win.

Now with Golden Boot Clash - YOU are in control! Everyone playing sees the same pitch and players. It takes concentration, speed, and strategy to beat the opponent. Do you have what it takes?

KEY FEATURES:
*Master the art of Free-kicks!*
• Shoot over different walls to score goals and hit precise targets to rack up points.
• Games only take about 2 minutes to play, pick up and play whenever you like
• Compete from amateur to professional tournaments and more
• Powered by Skillz, earn real world rewards and cash prizes (where available)
• Beautiful graphics and effects

If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at AlmostThereEntertainmentLtd@gmail.com

If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
